name: Seven Betrayers
description: This is a pixelated casual action game that tells the story of a sea-rimmed continent. In the story, our protagonist obtains information by defeating monsters and unlocking elite monsters to learn about the history and culture of the continent, and gradually learns the truth about the demonic infection. The story is told from the perspective of the seven betrayers, and the player defeats them through battle and leaves the continent for a new world after learning the truth!
